page.title: 19Schools in Boroughbridge
page.content: Boroughbridge Primary School was built in the 1930's.It was built before world war two.In 1939 a bomb shelter was erected underneath the school playing field.The school has approximately 200 children and seven teachers.It's built of red brick and it's surrounded by playing fields and a playing yard.The children start at the age of four and finish at the age of eleven before going to the high school. Boroughbridge High School was built in 1980.Now in 1985 there are four year groups.It seems big to us, compared to our school.Boroughbridge leisure centre is attached to the High School so school children and the public can use It's facilities.At the moment there are four hundred children in the High School,children start at the age of 11 and finish at 16.
